sentences.en: He wondered if the police investigation would uncover the offending car and driver.
sentences.cn: 他不知道警察能不能查获这辆犯法的汽车及驾车人.

sentences.en: I will say I honestly think, even at the risk of offending people.
sentences.cn: 即使有可能冒犯人,我也要说我真心所想的.

sentences.en: In such event the offending member or guest shall be trespasser.
sentences.cn: 在此情况下,违例的会员或嘉宾一概视作擅自进入论.

sentences.en: Ms Mann is working with young offenders and trying to break cycles of offending.
sentences.cn: 曼女士正在从事帮助少年犯的工作，试图打破犯罪的恶性循环。

sentences.en: Taoist Wang hesitated occasionally about these transactions for fearof offending the deities.
sentences.cn: 道士也有过犹豫,怕这样会得罪了神.

sentences.en: The book was withdrawn for the offending passages to be deleted.
sentences.cn: 这本书因含有需要删除的问题章节而被撤回。

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: The effect of the adjustment is to limit economic growth in the offending region.
sentences.cn: 调整的结果是限制了违章地区的经济增长.

sentences.en: The modification required is to interchange the offending column with a suitable column to the right.
sentences.cn: 需要调整的是把这引起麻烦的一列与其右边适当一列交换.

sentences.en: The offending comment was in fact a heckle from an audience member.
sentences.cn: 这番冒犯性的话实际上是一名观众的诘难。
令某些人不悦的那段话已经删除。

sentences.en: Winston read through the offending article.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿把这篇犯忌的文章读了一遍.

sentences.en: Xiao Li, on the contrary, was afraid of offending others.
sentences.cn: 小李却相反, 害怕得罪人.

sentences.en: You had better neglect your relations, than run the risk of offending your patroness.
sentences.cn: 你最好把亲戚关系看得淡一些.免得担那么大的风险,得罪了你的女施主.

sentences.en: You have the right to express yourself without offending other users.
sentences.cn: 用户有权表达自我,但不可攻击他人.

words.tran_cn: 攻击的；冒犯的；无礼的；讨厌的
犯罪，过错；进攻；触怒；引起反感的事物

trans.tran_en: making people feel angry or insulted
